# #. About

æ‰‹é †ã¯ [å…¬å¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆ](https://github.com/chaintope/tapyrus-core/blob/master/doc/tapyrus/getting_started.md#how-to-start-a-new-tapyrus-network) ã«æ²¿ã£ã¦é€²ã‚ã¦ã„ãã¾ã™ã€‚
å„ç¨®ç”¨èªãªã©ã®è§£èª¬ã¯ã“ã®è¨˜äº‹ã§ã¯çœãã¾ã™ã€‚

**Tapyrusã«ã¤ã„ã¦**
Tapyrusã¯Chaintopeç¤¾ã®é–‹ç™ºã™ã‚‹ãƒã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒªãƒƒãƒ‰å‹ã®ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ãƒã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ³ã§ã™ã€‚è©³ã—ãã¯ä¸‹è¨˜ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‹ã‚‰ã€‚

# 1. Define the federation members of the new Tapyrus network
ã¾ãšã¯ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã®æ§‹æˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦æ±ºã‚ã¾ã™ã€‚ä»Šå›ã¯æœ€å°ã®æ§‹æˆã§è¡ŒããŸã„ã®ã§ã€

## a. Signer
GitHubãƒ¬ãƒã‚¸ãƒˆãƒªã‹ã‚‰ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ³ã—ã¦ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
https://github.com/chaintope/tapyrus-signer

ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã¯ã€Œã•ãã‚‰ã®ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ‰ã€ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚¹ãƒšãƒƒã‚¯ã¯ ï¼‘Core-1GB-CentOS7.9 ã¨ã—è¨ˆï¼“å°ç”¨æ„ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

**ç’°å¢ƒæ§‹ç¯‰**
ãƒ»ã•ãã‚‰ã®ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ‰
ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‰é¸ã‚“ã ã‚‰OSã¨ã‚¹ãƒšãƒƒã‚¯æŒ‡å®šã—ã¦ãƒãƒãƒãƒã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ç°¡å˜ã«ç«‹ã¡ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚çœç•¥ã€‚

ãƒ»Rust
```bash:bash
# ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«
$ curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh

# ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°
$ echo '# rust' >> ~/.bash_profile
$ echo 'source $HOME/.cargo/env' >> ~/.bash_profile

# å†èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿
$ source .bash_profile

# ç¢ºèª
$ rustc --version
rustc 1.54.0 (a178d0322 2021-07-26)
```

ãƒ»tapyrus-signer
```bash:bash
# git
$ git clone https://github.com/chaintope/tapyrus-signer.git

# build
$ cd tapyrus-signer
$ cargo build --release
$ sudo cp target/release/tapyrus-signerd /usr/bin/
```

ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã¯ã€Œã•ãã‚‰ã®ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ‰ã€ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚¹ãƒšãƒƒã‚¯ã¯ ï¼‘Core-1GB-CentOS7.9 ã¨ã—ï¼‘å°ç”¨æ„ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

# 3. Generate Aggregate public key
Signerãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã®é›†ç´„å…¬é–‹éµã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

## a. Generate key pair
Signeræ¯ã«public_keyã¨private_keyã®ãƒšã‚¢ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
```bash:bash
$ cd tapyrus-signer/target/release

$ ./tapyrus-setup createkey
<private_key> <public_key>
```
ç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚ŒãŸç§˜å¯†éµã¯ç¬¬ä¸‰è€…ã®æ‰‹ã«æ¸¡ã‚‰ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ä¿ç®¡ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
ä»¥é™ã§ã¯ã€Signerã‚’å…¬é–‹éµã§ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒˆã—Signer[i]ã€€(i=1,2,3...n)ã¨è¡¨è¨˜ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
ã“ã“ã§ã¯

| Signer[i] | public_key[i]                                                |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Signer[1] | 02a8081a4fd452c7e9278697c1551771fe6a18b2cd866112aa1d9769f68943c711 |
| Signer[2] | 0332d52f282d2d2a14715347d10ab0ab82a8e1df6cbd3d7c82bec09d57e3ed4be2 |
| Signer[3] | 03865f73ceb05164b1792c75f21a770b9bf021375e668afd0ec8c302f641b479ee |

ã¨ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚
:::message
ä»¥é™ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€é•·ã£ãŸã‚‰ã—ãã¦ã—ã‚‡ã†ãŒãªã„ã®ã§åˆå‡ºä»¥å¤–ã®å€¤ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯çœç•¥ã—ã¦è¡¨è¨˜ã—ã¦ã„ãã¾ã™ã€‚

## b. Generate Node VSS
Node VSSã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

**Signer[1]**
```bash:bash
$ ./tapyrus-setup createnodevss \
  --public-key=<public_key[1]> \
  --public-key=<public_key[2]> \
  --public-key=<public_key[3]> \
  --private-key=<private_key[1]> \
  --threshold=2
```
```bash:output
<public_key[1]>:
<public_key[2]>:
<public_key[3]>:
```
å‡ºåŠ›ã¯<public_key[1]>: <node_vss[i, n]>ã®å½¢ã§è¿”ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚
ã‚ˆã£ã¦
| node_vss      | value                                                        |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| node_vss[1,1] |  |
| node_vss[1,2] |  |
| node_vss[1,3] |  |

**Signer[2]**
```bash:bash
$ ./tapyrus-setup createnodevss \
  --public-key=<public_key[1]> \
  --public-key=<public_key[2]> \
  --public-key=<public_key[3]> \
  --private-key=<private_key[2]> \
  --threshold=2
```
```bash:output
<public_key[1]>:
<public_key[2]>:
<public_key[3]>:
```
ã‚ˆã£ã¦

| ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| node_vss[2,1] |  |
| node_vss[2,2] |  |
| node_vss[2,3] |  |

**Signer[3]**
```bash:bash
$ ./tapyrus-setup createnodevss \
  --public-key=<public_key[1]> \
  --public-key=<public_key[2]> \
  --public-key=<public_key[3]> \
  --private-key=<private_key[3]> \
  --threshold=2
```

## c. Generate an Aggregated public key
é›†ç´„å…¬é–‹å›éµã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

**Signer[1]**
```bash:bash
$ ./tapyrus-setup aggregate \
  --vss=node_vss[1,1] \
  --vss=node_vss[2,1] \
  --vss=node_vss[3,1] \
  --private-key=<private_key[1]>
```
 ```bash:output
04971abe66a7e79a65aa12125a17bf5b2be25ae41c659a93696dd0331e72dfd15dec3281e44c6c3bf44c78def8fed54beabd93f4a284b30fbb9539b1db3e0e6801 <node_secret_share[1]>
 ```
<aggregated_public_key> <node_secret_share[i]>ã®å½¢ã§å‡ºåŠ›ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚
node_secret_shareã¯ç§˜å¯†è£ã«ä¿ç®¡ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

**Signer[2]**
```bash:bash
$ ./tapyrus-setup aggregate \
  --vss=node_vss[1,2] \
  --vss=node_vss[2,2] \
  --vss=node_vss[3,2] \
  --private-key=<private_key[2]>
```
 ```bash:output
04971abe66a7e79a65aa12125a17bf5b2be25ae41c659a93696dd0331e72dfd15dec3281e44c6c3bf44c78def8fed54beabd93f4a284b30fbb9539b1db3e0e6801 <node_secret_share[2]>
 ```

**Signer[3]**
```bash:bash
$ ./tapyrus-setup aggregate \
  --vss=node_vss[1,3] \
  --vss=node_vss[2,3] \
  --vss=node_vss[3,3] \
  --private-key=<private_key[3]>
```
 ```bash:output
04971abe66a7e79a65aa12125a17bf5b2be25ae41c659a93696dd0331e72dfd15dec3281e44c6c3bf44c78def8fed54beabd93f4a284b30fbb9539b1db3e0e6801 <node_secret_share[3]>
 ```
ã‚ˆã£ã¦é›†ç´„å…¬é–‹éµã¯
```
04971abe66a7e79a65aa12125a17bf5b2be25ae41c659a93696dd0331e72dfd15dec3281e44c6c3bf44c78def8fed54beabd93f4a284b30fbb9539b1db3e0e6801
```

# 4. Create a new genesis block
tapyrus-coreã«å«ã¾ã‚Œã‚‹tapyrus-genesisã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã§coreã‚’ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã—ã¦ã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ãã‚Œã‚’ä½¿ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
:::details macã§ã®ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰æ–¹æ³•
```zsh:zsh
# xcode
$ xcode-select --install

# ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒª
$ brew install automake berkeley-db4 libtool boost miniupnpc pkg-config python qt libevent qrencode
$ brew install librsvg

# BerkeleyDB
$ ./contrib/install_db4.sh .

# git
$ git clone https://github.com/chaintope/tapyrus-core
$ cd tapyrus-core

#build
$ ./autogen.sh
$ ./configure --without-gui
$ make

# check
$ make check
```
:::

:::message
`tapyrus-genesis` ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€å…¬å¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã§ã¯time,addressä¸¡å¼•æ•°ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ãŒã€æŒ‡å®šã™ã¹ãå†…å®¹ãŒã‚ˆãåˆ†ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ï¼†helpè¦‹ã‚‹ã¨optionalãªã®ã§ã²ã¨ã¾ãšæŒ‡å®šãªã—ã§é€²ã‚ã¾ã™ã€‚
:::

```bash:bash
./tapyrus-genesis \
  -signblockpubkey=04971abe66a7e79a65aa12125a17bf5b2be25ae41c659a93696dd0331e72dfd15dec3281e44c6c3bf44c78def8fed54beabd93f4a284b30fbb9539b1db3e0e6801
```

ã“ã“ã§ã€é›†ç´„å…¬é–‹éµã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒƒãƒˆã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå‡ºã¾ã™ã€‚ï¼ˆ2021/09/05ã¾ã§ï¼‰
Chaintopeã®ä¸­ã®äººã«å•ã„åˆã‚ã›ãŸã¨ã“ã‚ã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®æ‰‹é †ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šåœ§ç¸®ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§è§£æ±ºã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ã€‚
```ruby:irb
require 'tapyrus'
Tapyrus::Key.new(pubkey: '04971abe66a7e79a65aa12125a17bf5b2be25ae41c659a93696dd0331e72dfd15dec3281e44c6c3bf44c78def8fed54beabd93f4a284b30fbb9539b1db3e0e6801').to_point.to_hex
```
```ruby:output
=> "03971abe66a7e79a65aa12125a17bf5b2be25ae41c659a93696dd0331e72dfd15d"
```

# 5. Generate genesis block proof
## a. Generate Block VSS
block_vssã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã™

**Signer[1]**
```bash:bash
$ ./tapyrus-setup createblockvss \
  --public-key=<public_key[1]> \
  --public-key=<public_key[2]> \
  --public-key=<public_key[3]> \
  --private-key=<private_key[1]> \
  --threshold=2
```
 ```bash:output
<public_key[1]>:
<public_key[2]>:
<public_key[3]>:
 ```
å‡ºåŠ›ã¯ <public_key[i]> <block_vss[i,n]> ã®å½¢ã§ã™ã€‚

## b. Sign block locally
ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã§ç½²åã—ã¾ã™
:::message
å¼•æ•°ã«æ¸¡ã™é›†ç´„å…¬é–‹éµã¯åœ§ç¸®/éåœ§ç¸®ã©ã¡ã‚‰ã§ã‚‚å‡ºåŠ›å†…å®¹ã«å·®ç•°ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸã€‚
:::

**Signer[1]**
```bash:bash
./tapyrus-setup sign \
  â€”block-vss=<block_vss[1,1]> \
  â€”block-vss=<block_vss[2,1]> \
  â€”block-vss=<block_vss[3,1]> \
  â€”aggregated-public-key=<aggregated_public_key> \
  --node-secret-share=<node_secret_share[1]> \
  â€”private-key=<private_key[1]> \
  â€”block=<ã•ã£ãä½œã£ãŸãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã®HEX> \
  â€”threshold=2
```
  ```bash:output
9393733cb3ed85698370d04416c0d9b85f47ffe863aead8ec7e32664defbe96aa09b677a852f4799cc58bb0771dcf1cd54cc084efc8e03c0e7e100d2f37ba1ec02a8081a4fd452c7e9278697c1551771fe6a18b2cd866112aa1d9769f68943c711
  ```

**Signer[2]**
```bash:bash
./tapyrus-setup sign \
  â€”block-vss=<block_vss[1,2]> \
  â€”block-vss=<block_vss[2,2]> \
  â€”block-vss=<block_vss[3,2]> \
  â€”aggregated-public-key=<aggregated_public_key> \
  --node-secret-share=<node_secret_share[2]> \
  â€”private-key=<private_key[2]> \
  â€”block=<ã•ã£ãä½œã£ãŸãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã®HEX> \
  â€”threshold=2
```
  ```bash:output

  ```

**Signer[3]**
```bash:bash

  â€”block-vss=<block_vss[1,3]> \

  â€”threshold=2
```
  ```bash:output

  ```

ã‚ˆã£ã¦
| local_sig[i] | value                                                        |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
| local_sig[1] | 9393733cb3ed85698370d04416c0d9b85f47ffe863aead8ec7e32664defbe96aa09b677a852f4799cc58bb0771dcf1cd54cc084efc8e03c0e7e100d2f37ba1ec02a8081a4fd452c7e9278697c1551771fe6a18b2cd866112aa1d9769f68943c711 |
| local_sig[2] | e49e4f56835e02932ea74b914780bee815cb82d12b1f28b8119cb1b5aa3d2354a09b677a852f4799cc58bb0771dcf1cd54cc084efc8e03c0e7e100d2f37ba1ec0332d52f282d2d2a14715347d10ab0ab82a8e1df6cbd3d7c82bec09d57e3ed4be2 |

## c. Compute the signature of the genesis block
ã‚¸ã‚§ãƒã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã®ã‚·ã‚°ãƒãƒãƒ£ã‚’è¨ˆç®—ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

**Signer[1]**
```bash:bash
./tapyrus-setup computesig \
  --sig=<local_sig[1]> \
  --sig=<local_sig[2]> \
  --sig=<local_sig[3]> \
  --private-key=<private_key[1]> \
  --block=<block> \
  --block-vss=<block_vss[1, 1]> \
  --block-vss=<block_vss[2, 1]> \
  --block-vss=<block_vss[3, 1]> \
  --node-vss=<node_vss[1, 1]> \
  --node-vss=<node_vss[2, 1]> \
  --node-vss=<node_vss[3, 1]> \
  --aggregated-public-key=<aggregated_public_key> \
  --node-secret-share=<node_secret_share[1]> \
  --threshold=2
```

  ```bash:output

  ```
